mapper.select: select service from tb_micro_info where micro_service = #{micro} limit 1
select * from tb_image_info where micro_service = #{microService} and container is not null
mapper.insert: insert into tb_image_info ( image, micro_service, image_name, image_real_name, image_status, image_status_detail, container, container_domain ) values ( #{obj.image}, #{obj.microService}, #{obj.imageName}, #{obj.imageRealName}, #{obj.imageStatus}, #{obj.imageStatusDetail}, #{obj.container}, #{obj.containerDomain} )
mapper.update: update tb_image_info set image_name = #{imageName}, mod_timestamp = current_timestamp where image = #{image}
update tb_image_info set image_real_name = #{imageRealName}, mod_timestamp = current_timestamp where image = #{image}
update tb_image_info set image_status = #{imageStatus}, image_status_detail = #{imageStatusDetail}, mod_timestamp = current_timestamp where image = #{image}
update tb_image_info set container = #{container}, container_domain = #{containerDomain}, mod_timestamp = current_timestamp where image = #{image}
